page.description: A list of image gallery properties with their descriptions.

case.title: Default image directory
case.description: This value is normally bound by an argument to a field in an Alpha Five data driven component. The default value is typically used for testing.

case.title: Image directory sort criteria
case.description: Specifies the sort order for the image directory.

case.title: Default filter
case.description: Should you need to filter the images returned from the wildcard search of the images directory, a filter string may be applied. This can also be bound by an argument to a field in an Alpha Five data driven component or to a JavaScript function.

case.title: Limit the number of images displayed
case.description: Limits the number of images displayed.

case.title: * Maximum images to display
case.description: Image count threshold. This limits the number of thumbnails/images displayed in the gallery. Example, if set to 32 and the directory contains 100 images, only the first 32 will be displayed. Minimum value is 2.

case.title: Background color
case.description: Select a light or dark background for the image gallery.

case.title: Display slideshow button
case.description: Show the slideshow control. Allows the user to turn on a slideshow.

case.title: Slideshow delay
case.description: Set the time delay in milliseconds between slide transitions, default is 5000. Minimum is 3000. Maximum is 15000.

case.title: Display image filename
case.description: Display the image filename, within the image footer, center justified.

case.title: Display formatted EXIF information
case.description: Show the EXIF data (if available) contained in the jpg file. The EXIF data will follow the image description, if displayed. VERY IMPORTANT: You must have ImageMagick installed on your server in order to show EXIF data. The ImageMagick 'identify.exe' program is used to extract EXIF data. This program must be in the path. To get ImageMagick go to http://www.imagemagick.org/

case.title: Display Google Map and image marker
case.description: Show a Google Map, on the flip side of the Info Panel, if the photo has lat/lon data.

case.title: Display Text to speech button for supported browsers
case.description: Display a Play button that converts the Info Panel text to speech. Uses .NET TTS library and HTML5 audio. Only displays in supported webkit browsers.

case.title: Display image description in Info Panel
case.description: Show the description within the info panel, if available. The description field requires binding to a database table. The directory name and the image name are the primary keys. The field data may contain HTML markup.

group.title: Data Binding - Images Table - Image Description

case.title: Database type
case.description: Specify the table type for the images table.

case.title: Connection string
case.description: Specify the connection string for the SQL images table.

case.title: Table name
case.description: Specify the table name for the images table.

case.title: Field map
case.description: Specify the field mapping, if required.
